title: Strengthening Labor Union Leadership Competencies in the Fourth Industrial Revolution

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic labor union operations and foundational concepts of digital transformation
context.additional_context: Emphasizing practical competencies for organizational digital transformation and leadership changes targeting current professionals

learning_goals: They can analyze and explain three or more impacts of 4th Industrial Revolution technologies on labor union decision-making processes.
They can develop an action plan to apply organizational learning strategies acquired through fieldwork to real work environments.
They can design negotiation strategies based on labor-management conflict cases during digital transformation and practice them through role-playing.
They can predict and evaluate job redesign requirements due to Industry 4.0 technology adoption using mathematical modeling.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
